inclusion.criterion: At least one sonographic examination of the cervical lymph nodes
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Lymph node with oval shape, hypoechoic cortex, smooth border, hyperechoic hilum and hilar Doppler flow by ultrasound
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Lymph node less than 5 mm in short axis on ultrasound
exclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has metastatic papillary thyroid cancer with multiple treatments, including XRT and RAI ablation. Recent worsening dysphagia and poor oral intake may indicate progression of disease.
